transcript: different frames around content making that helped me was one is seeing it as practice rather than the game so like when we're doing a podcast it's practice for me getting better for future may rather than like this is the main game it's like no the game is the whole thing and this is just like we're still in preseason these scores these touchdowns don't even matter yet you can say yet even though like I can still feel like I'm a preseason but I think from a mental framework it actually decreases the stakes associated with doing it and I think that's been helpful for me especially it was in the earlier days
